subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets won the game in the bottom of the ninth inning when the Giants catcher Buster Posey’s throw went astray, allowing Ruben Tejada to score the winning run.
snippet: The Mets won the game in the bottom of the ninth inning when the Giants catcher Buster Posey’s throw went astray, allowing Ruben Tejada to score the winning run.
